summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-third Avenue North from East Madison Street to East Mercer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by installing a watermain and fire hydrants, all in accordance with Majority Petition, being File No. 47776 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
